mapper.select: select ci.status = 0 from assignment a inner join course_chapter_section ccs on ccs.section_id = a.section_id inner join course ci on ci.id = ccs.course_id ::uuid where a.id =#{id}::uuid;
mapper.update: update assignment set name = #{name}, end_at = #{endAt}, qualified_score = #{qualifiedScore} where id=#{id}::uuid;
mapper.insert: insert into assignment (section_id, name, end_at, qualified_score) values (#{sectionId}, #{name}, #{endAt}, #{qualifiedScore});
